channel.title: A little help with my clanchat

item.title: A little help with my clanchat
item.dc:creator: @joeyjoe9876 joeyjoe9876
item.description:
@joeyjoe9876 wrote:

public void listChats(String chat, int player) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[player]; p.clearQuestInterface(); int maxx = 0; for(int c = 0; c < server.playerHandler.maxPlayers; c++) { if(server.playerHandler.players[c] != null { p.sendQuest("@whi@"+server.playerHandler.players[c].playerName+".", 16501+c); } } }

i am having problems making that display people in a certain clan, right now it shows people in every clan including the one the person is in.
if anyone can help i will most certanly rep (even tho reputation is worthless here =/)

Read full topic
item.source: A little help with my clanchat
